website_summaries.verdict: For those who have a hard time lining up properly to address the ball, this trainer teaches alignment.
pros: Uses a mirror surface so you can see exactly how you're aligned as you stand over a putt
With lines printed on the mirror and adjustable vertical pegs, it guides your putting stroke along the proper path
Small enough to carry with you anywhere you want to practice
cons: Will give you an uncomfortable glare on sunny days

customer_reviews.title: Stop missing putts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to improve putting. The guidelines on the mirror allow you to see the position of your head and shoulders as well as the square alignment of the putter face. There is a two position optional back stop to prevent excessive backswings and a "gate" through which the ball must clear to ensure a straight strike. Designed for right and left handed players and comes with a handy cloth-like zip bag. I luv it!
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome putting aid
customer_reviews.text: This cheap putting mirror has done wonders for my golf game. I know I'm supposed to line up my right eye over the ball (as a left handed golfer). What I didn't realize is that I was leaning over way too much. My eyes were barely on the edge of the mirror. I now have confidence that I'm going to make those 6 foot putts for birdie or to save par. They don't always go in, but I feel like I'm going to make them rather than just hoping they go in. Best golf aid I've ever bought.

customer_reviews.author: Nancy Heyse

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for fine-tuning putter alignment.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - You can see your eyeline in relation to the ball which really helps improve your alignment. - The 12" size is great for portability. It's lightweight and fits perfectly in the Ogio Ozone stand bag. A larger putting mirror might be unwieldy in a crowded practice putting green. Cons: - The alignment lines show you straight-back-straight-through and inside-square-inside putter paths. What it lacks is the inside-down-the-line putter path which is the stroke I prefer. This is the most disappointing issue with this product. - It scratches easily, so I'm concerned about the durability of the product.
customer_reviews.author: penguingrooves

customer_reviews.title: shows you where you're going wrong
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a little mirror to reflect the truth. It wasn't the wind that made you slice, it was your swing! And now, you can check it and correct it with this little baby! I like to take it to the driving range with my son. It helps him understand what he's really doing when he swings. Me, I'd prefer the bigger model, I think. This is small and works well and if you keep your eye on the ball you'll see what you're doing. If your back swing is the problem, get the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Adryenn Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A useful tool to help your alignment
customer_reviews.text: I got this putting mirror for my husband who is always complaining about his form! Like others have said, I like the concept of it. Golfers use mirrors and also videotape themselves, so they can analyze their form and shot. The SKLZ Putting Mirror is sturdy and does everything it claims--helps with club alignment and helps your stroke accuracy. As long as you keep your head over the ball during your shot, it will give you a good idea on how to improve your swing.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Calabrese

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my husband who is a casual golfer looking to improve his game. We never considered the idea of playing on a mirrored surface in order to actually watch yourself as you swing. Brilliant! This product was actually extremely helpful with his posture - something he thought he had figured out - and ultimately helped a lot with his swing. This would be an excellent product for anyone who is looking to fine tune their swing and improve accuracy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Cool product!
customer_reviews.text: For starters, I am a beginner golfer. I am learning this year to golf-this product is nice because you line up the ball and look down and I can see where I am putting your ball and can make necessary adjustments. Nice for a beginner!

product_meta.title: SKLZ Putting Mirror - Alignment Training Mirror
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

 SKLZ PUTTING MIRROR - 12 INCHES OR 21 INCHES 

Improve your putting accuracy and consistency with the SKLZ 12-inch and 21-inch Putting Mirrors. Both sizes offer a large surface, for a full view of your head and shoulder alignment over the ball, and 8 or 10 optional putting pegs (depending on mirror size) to serve as a path guide, exit gate, and backstroke control. Depending on how you set the pegs, you can practice a square or arcing putting path for left or right handed use. The durable 3/16" mirror comes with a protective carry bag for storage between sessions.


 FEATURES 
 * Improves optimal path and proper alignment

 * Both sizes include protective carry bag

 * Great for left or right handed players
   

 * 12i Putting Mirror, 8 putting pegs, protective carry bag

 * 21i Mirror measures 21" x 8", with 10 putting pegs



 ABOUT SKLZ 
SKLZ is committed to elevating the athlete in each of us by guiding and serving athletes on their journeys to be their personal best. As the flagship brand of Pro Performance Sports, based in San Diego California, SKLZ develops innovative athletic performance and skill development training products, technology and knowledge for serious athletes of all ages, skill levels and sports including baseball, football, soccer, golf, softball and basketball. SKLZ is known around the world for delivering durable, high-performance training products used by professional and amateur athletes as well as their coaches and trainers seeking to improve on a sport-specific skill or a performance-focused goal such as speed, agility, balance or core strength.
